description: Building EV charging infrastructure and smart hardware solutions for Africa's clean energy transition. Developing platforms for charging station management, vehicle sales, and service operations.

Software agency building solutions for multiple clients including forecourt automation systems and therapy consultation management platforms. Architected reusable frontend frameworks and component libraries used across PlugDrive and other client projects.
Led frontend engineering teams building EV charging station management platform serving multiple charging providers. Delivered admin dashboards, customer portals, and real-time monitoring systems.

Built e-commerce workflow automation platform integrating payment processing, shipping logistics, and inventory management. Created custom CMS enabling merchants to manage storefronts, products, and content.
Contributed to enterprise web development projects for LBM's clients. Focused on building custom applications and dynamic web solutions with emphasis on user experience.
Developed team collaboration platform with task tracking, messaging, and calendar scheduling. Built cross-platform desktop application with real-time data synchronization.
Built three SaaS applications helping small businesses manage client communications and online visibility. Implemented analytics tracking to provide data-driven insights for product strategy.
